title: Pushpakamal Kundanalu: Emerald, Ruby, and Diamond Flower Earrings
features: Floral motif inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry. Features a central ruby cluster surrounded by diamonds, with oval-cut emeralds accentuating the outer edges. The gold is intricately crafted with delicate filigree work along the edges, providing a light and airy feel. Handcrafted in Hyderabad using traditional techniques.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds
and sparkling white diamonds. The contrast creates a visually appealing and regal look.
occasions: festive celebrations like Sankranti and Ugadi
and special occasions. Perfect for pairing with Kanjeevaram sarees or lehengas. Can also be styled with contemporary outfits for a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: These 'Pushpakamal Kundanalu' are a testament to exquisite Hyderabadi craftsmanship, combining traditional design with modern appeal. The vibrant gemstone combination holds cultural significance, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The use of high-quality materials ensures durability and lasting beauty. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear, making them a perfect addition to your jewelry collection. A timeless heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
